text: This really sucks, Zatt. I'm dissapointed.
speaker: teach

text: I don't want to do this anymore. This is stupid.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: You need to grow up and be responsible for once. This is your place as a warrior.
speaker: teach

text: And why should I be a warrior?
speaker: zatt_sad

text: The world is like this because we grew lazy and weak.
speaker: teach

text: Is this really how you want to live your life?
speaker: teach
